inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis defined by any one of the following
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unclear diagnosis of cirrhosis (does not meet the criteria outlined above)
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease and experiences slowness of movement and tremors. He is on Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl, which help with shaking and slow movement.
